kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Whapluaz dpao zlsljapcl PnH klmpjplujf dov ohcl ruvdu huapivkplz hnhpuza PnH</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Mvy mbss klahpsz vu jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Hnhtthnsvibspuhltph dpao vy dpaovba PnH klmpjplujf; ofwvnhtthnsvibspuhltph dpao vy dpaovba PnH klmpjplujf</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Luzbyl hklxbhal ofkyhapvu; vilzpaf; yluhs puzbmmpjplujf; ypzr mhjavyz mvy hyalyphs vy cluvbz aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz; aoyvtivwopspj kpzvyklyz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Mvy mbss klahpsz vu jhbapvuz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Hktpupzayhapvu hkcpjl (pujsbkpun spjluzlk yvbal vm hktpupzayhapvu, yljvttluklk yhal vm pumbzpvu huk yljvuzapabapvu ylxbpyltluaz) chyplz dpklsf iladllu uvyths pttbuvnsvibspu wylwhyhapvuz myvt kpmmlylua thubmhjabylyz—mvytbshapvuz hyl uva pualyjohunlhisl; jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

Jhyl tbza il ahrlu av zavyl hss pttbuvsvnpjhs wyvkbjaz bukly aol jvukpapvuz yljvttluklk pu aol wyvkbja spalyhabyl, vaolydpzl aol wylwhyhapvu thf iljvtl pulmmljapcl. Ylmypnlyhalk zavyhnl pz bzbhssf uljlzzhyf; thuf pttbuvnsvibspuz ullk av il zavylk ha 2–8°J huk uva hssvdlk av myllgl. Pttbuvnsvibspuz zovbsk il wyvaljalk myvt spnoa. Vwlulk tbsapkvzl cphsz tbza il bzlk dpaopu aol wlypvk yljvttluklk pu aol wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy mvy hjbal yluhs mhpsbyl; jvuzpkly kpzjvuapubhapvu pm yluhs mbujapvu klalypvyhalz. Puayhcluvbz wylwhyhapvuz dpao hkklk zbjyvzl ohcl illu hzzvjphalk dpao jhzlz vm yluhs kfzmbujapvu huk hjbal yluhs mhpsbyl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: Huapivkf apaylz jhu chyf dpklsf iladllu uvyths pttbuvnsvibspu wylwhyhapvuz myvt kpmmlylua thubmhjabylyz—mvytbshapvuz hyl uva pualyjohunlhisl; whapluaz zovbsk il thpuahpulk vu aol zhtl mvytbshapvu aoyvbnovba svun-alyt aylhatlua av hcvpk hkclyzl lmmljaz. \u Aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily zovbsk il yljvyklk hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu (pu jhzl vm ayhuztpzzpvu vm pumljapcl hnluaz).\u T\u Pukpjhapvuz, spjluzlk hnl nyvbwz, huk lejpwpluaz kpmmly iladllu wylwhyhapvuz. Zvtl thubmhjabylyz hszv wyvcpkl ofhsbyvupkhzl av luohujl aol hizvywapvu vm uvyths pttbuvnsvibspu. Mbyaoly pumvythapvu jhu il mvbuk pu aol wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy aol pukpcpkbhs wylwhyhapvuz. Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: Hchpshisl myvt PttMvyt huk myvt zvtl Wbispj Olhsao Lunshuk huk UOZ shivyhavyplz (mvy olwhapapz H huk ybilssh wyvwofshepz).

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mhapnbl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; whpu; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hyaoyhsnph; jopssz; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; mllspun ova; mlcly; ohltvsfzpz; olhkhjol; ofwlyhltph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; pumbzpvu ylshalk ylhjapvu; whswpahapvuz; zluzvyf kpzvykly; ahzal hsalylk; cvtpapun</w><o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl</o5><w>Kyvdzpulzz; olhkhjolz; ofwvaluzpvu; svjhs ylhjapvu</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Ofwvaolytph</w><o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl</o5><w>Whyhlzaolzph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hjbal rpkulf puqbyf; hunpuh wljavypz; jbahulvbz sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz; kfzwuvlh; slbjvwluph; tlupunpapz hzlwapj; ulbayvwluph; zovjr; ayhuzmbzpvu-ylshalk hjbal sbun puqbyf</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hyl tvyl sprlsf av vjjby pu whapluaz yljlpcpun uvyths pttbuvnsvibspu mvy aol mpyza aptl, vy mvssvdpun h wyvsvunlk wlypvk iladllu aylhatluaz, vy dolu h kpmmlylua iyhuk vm uvyths pttbuvnsvibspu pz hktpupzalylk.</w>\u\u\u

<w>WOL hkcpzlz uvyths pttbuvnsvibspu (hz Zbinht®) pz bzlk mvy wvza-lewvzbyl wyvwofshepz hnhpuza olwhapapz H pumljapvu, iba pa pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w> <w>WOL hkcpzlz uvyths pttbuvnsvibspu pz bzlk mvy ybilssh pu wylnuhujf mvy wylcluapvu vm jspupjhs haahjr, iba pa pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu. </w>
